hero.slogan: High-quality legal solutions that create advantages
hero.description: Caspian Consulting Ltd provids strategic legal solutions to support and protect your business.

about.welcome: Welcome to Caspian Consulting Ltd-Your Trusted Legal Partner
about.fullText:
Caspian Consulting Ltd is a reliable legal partner in business support. We specialize in providing high-quality legal services, ensuring strategic support for companies.

Since 2007, our team of highly experienced lawyers has been delivering comprehensive legal services tailored to the needs of companies across multiple sectors. Originally established as Caspian Investment Consulting LLP, we specialized in legal support for subsoil use projects, particularly in the oil and gas sector. Our expertise included everything from negotiating contracts with government authorities to full legal support of operations.

Today we continue our work as a Private Company Caspian Consulting Ltd, registered under the jurisdiction of the Astana International Financial Centre (AIFC). In our new format, we offer an expanded range of legal services, ensuring that we meet the needs of clients operating in a global market with increasingly complex legal requirements.

We understand that modern business requires legal support that is not only professional but also flexible, practical, and aligned with strategic goals. That is why we build long-term partnerships, providing solutions based on a deep understanding of industry specifics, the regulatory environment, and our clients’ business processes.

Whether your business requires expertise in corporate, contract, tax, labor, or natural resources law; support with transactions, disputes, or complex projects — Caspian Consulting Ltd delivers reliable and effective legal assistance.
about.title: About the Company
about.history: Our legal practice dates back to 2007 with the establishment of Caspian Investment Consulting LLP, which specialized in providing legal support for subsoil use projects. The core focus of the company was the comprehensive legal support of oil and gas companies — from negotiations with government authorities for contract execution to full legal assistance in operational activities.
about.today: Today, we continue our work under the name Caspian Consulting Ltd, a private company registered under the jurisdiction of the Astana International Financial Centre (AIFC).
about.profile: Our team brings together lawyers with extensive experience in civil, tax, and criminal law. We offer legal solutions tailored to business interests, emphasizing practical efficiency and strategic sustainability.

corporateLaw.title: Corporate Law
corporateLaw.description: We advise on the establishment, management, reorganization, and liquidation of legal entities. We provide legal protection of the interests of shareholders and participants, including the settlement of corporate disputes.

contractLaw.title: Contract Law
contractLaw.description: We draft, review, and support contracts of any complexity, including international agreements. We help minimize risks and protect clients' interests in case of disputes.

taxLaw.title: Tax Law
taxLaw.description: We provide comprehensive legal support in taxation matters, including tax planning, optimization, and representation during tax audits.

naturalResourcesLaw.title: Natural Resources Law
naturalResourcesLaw.description: We specialize in supporting subsoil use projects, including obtaining licenses, signing contracts, and legal support for companies in the oil and gas industry.

landLaw.title: Land and Real Estate Law
landLaw.description: We support transactions with land and real estate, including legal due diligence and title registration. We represent clients in land and property disputes.

laborLaw.title: Labor Law
laborLaw.description: We advise employers and employees on employment agreements, dismissals, labor disputes, and compliance with labor legislation.

administrativeLaw.title: Administrative Law
administrativeLaw.description: We assist in appealing the actions and decisions of government authorities, including inspections. We represent clients in administrative disputes and state interactions.

financialLaw.title: Financial and Banking Law
financialLaw.description: We advise on financial market regulations, banking activities, and attracting investments. We support securities transactions and consult on AIFC matters.

disputeResolution.title: Litigation and Arbitration
disputeResolution.description: We represent clients in courts of all instances in Kazakhstan. We have experience in international arbitration, including AIFC, ICC, LCIA, and other institutions.

itLaw.title: Intellectual Property and IT Law
itLaw.description: We protect rights to trademarks, inventions, copyrights, and related rights. We advise on digital law, personal data protection, and IT contracts.

competitionLaw.title: Competition Law
competitionLaw.description: We support clients in dealing with antimonopoly authorities and approving transactions. We provide legal defense against unfair competition and anticompetitive practices.

aifcLaw.title: AIFC Law
aifcLaw.description: We provide legal support for transactions and projects within the Astana International Financial Centre jurisdiction, working under AIFC Common Law and international standards.

infrastructureLaw.title: PPP and Infrastructure Projects
infrastructureLaw.description: We advise on public-private partnership agreements and support infrastructure projects at all stages — from concept to operation.

esgLaw.title: ESG and Sustainability
esgLaw.description: We support the integration of ESG practices into corporate policies and reporting. We assist projects aimed at sustainable development and compliance with international standards.

complianceLaw.title: Compliance and Anti-Corruption
complianceLaw.description: We conduct legal reviews for compliance with anti-corruption laws. We develop and implement corporate compliance programs and internal control mechanisms.

about.approach: We provide customized legal solutions that ensure the protection of clients' rights and interests while achieving business objectives. Our priorities are confidentiality, efficiency, and strategic partnership with every client.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Professional lawyers with expertise in various fields of law. We guarantee high-quality solutions to your legal matters.

nyrbekov.name: Zhan Nurbekov
nyrbekov.bio:
Zhan Nurbekov has 29 years of experience in legal support of projects in telecommunications, transport, subsoil use, and environmental protection. His professional background includes legal support for mergers and acquisitions, as well as the implementation of large-scale investment projects.

He has deep expertise in deal structuring, interaction with government regulators, and ensuring legal stability of business at all stages. He oversees the company’s strategic development and supervises key client projects.
nyrbekov.services: Civil Law, Subsoil Use Law, Environmental Law

klimkin.name: Sergey Klimkin
klimkin.bio:
Sergey Klimkin is an expert in civil and corporate law with over 35 years of legal and academic experience. He specializes in property law, contract and obligations law, as well as mergers and acquisitions of legal entities.

He is regularly engaged as an expert by government bodies, including the National Security Committee, the Anti-Corruption and Economic Crimes Agency, the Prosecutor's Office, the Constitutional Council, and the Supreme Court.

He is the author of over 360 academic publications and a regular participant in legal conferences.

skryabin.name: Sergey Skryabin
skryabin.bio:
Sergey Skryabin is a legal expert with over 30 years of practical experience in civil law (including corporate law, property law, obligations and contract law), civil procedure, and arbitration.

His clients include: NAC Kazatomprom, North Caspian Operating Company N.V. (NCOC), KazRosGas, Bogatyr Komir, and others.

He has participated in the drafting of legislation, legal acts, articles of association, contracts, and legal review of draft laws.
skryabin.services: Civil Law, Property Law, Contract Law

kaldybaev.name: Askar Kaldybayev
kaldybaev.position: Ph.D. in Law, LL.M. in German Law
kaldybaev.bio:
Askar Kaldybayev is a legal expert with 25 years of practice in mergers and acquisitions, and bankruptcy law.

He has served as arbitrator in over 60 cases at the International Arbitration Centre of the Astana International Financial Centre (AIFC), the Arbitration Centre at “Atameken”, and the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC), among others.

He has contributed to the development of several key laws in Kazakhstan, including the Subsoil Use Law, Arbitration Law, Law on Agglomerations, Banking Law, and the Law on LLPs.

He has authored over 50 publications on legal practice.
kaldybaev.services: Banking Law, Corporate Law, AIFC Law

kuryachenko.name: Dmitry Kuryachenko
kuryachenko.bio:
Dmitry Kuryachenko is a lawyer with more than 24 years of experience in protecting and representing interests in economic (including international arbitration in sports disputes under CAS and FIFA regulations), customs, tax, labor, and family disputes. He also handles high-profile criminal cases.

Dmitry has participated in the development of several laws.
kuryachenko.services: Civil, Criminal, Administrative Law; Customs and Labor Legislation

zairov.name: Berik Zairov
zairov.bio:
Berik Zairov is an expert with 14 years of experience in taxation and accounting. He has served as a financial director specializing in taxation, including reorganization, dividend payments, and other areas.

He has participated in government working groups, the Majilis and Senate on amendments to the Tax Code of Kazakhstan, and has led a working group on the reform of special tax regimes at the NPP 'Atameken'.

Drafting and implementation of subsoil use agreements

Legal expertise in ESG and sustainable financial instruments (green bonds, support of projects on carbon neutrality, climate finance, emission offset mechanisms, sustainable investments, and decarbonization)
Consulting on AIFC regulations (AIFC Law), investment transactions, and financial compliance

sections.title: Construction and Real Estate

sections.title: Agro-Industrial Complex and Food Security

sections.title: Digital Technologies and Telecommunications

Consulting on personal data protection, intellectual property, and cybersecurity
Legal aspects of digital transformation in energy, logistics, agro-industrial complex, and other sectors

sections.title: Public Sector and PPP

Consulting on regulatory issues, subsidies, and public procurement
Legal risk assessment and anti-corruption compliance

sections.title: Industry and Manufacturing

Labor protection, technical regulation, waste and emissions management
